page.title: 13Health in Saxilby Area
page.content: 5 doctors (1 part-time) work in Glebe House Surgery, Saxilby. They make home visits and hold surgeries outside this survey area. The staff comprises 1 practice manager, 1 dispenser, 3 receptionists, 1 part-time geriatric visitor and 1 cleaner. Work includes vaccinations, minor casualties and operations, ante- and post-natal clinics, immunisations, family planning, some cervical screening. A psychiatrist attends fortnightly. There is a computer for recall of patients and repeat prescriptions. At the Health Centre there are 2 health visitors and 2 district nurses doing weekly child health, ante-natal relaxation, monthly toddler clinics and mothercraft. A physiotherapist and chiropodist attend. Home helps, meals on wheels and equipment loans done by Gainsborough Social Services.
